channel.title: Stencyl
channel.description: Stencyl is the easiest way to create games for mobile, web and desktop without code.

item.title: 3.4.0 (Beta 5)
item.description: We've put out a new release that fixes many bugs and makes us compatible with Apple's latest and greatest.

item.title: Stencyl Jam 2016
item.description: Hey everyone, it's Stencyl Jam time again!
